I'll take the original crack over this one any day, as the original doesn't modify any files and works just fine.  For those of you who are experiencing framerate drops, it's the engine.  The Anvil engine, or AnvilNext as they're calling it now, has been incredibly unoptimized since the very first Assassin's Creed game and it will probably be terribly unoptimized for the next five games as well.

Anyone else have a "damaged saved game" problem?

False alarm! I got it to work. However, if you're having any issues, here is what I did. 

For playing the game, I opened up my cracked version of uplay, then started ACIII and that worked.

If you have a damaged save file, I started the game in safe mode and that did the trick. 

Hope this helps.
